att_msg: This app may use data such as your email address and posture measurement history to provide more convenient and personalized services.

login.error_msg: An error occurred. Please try again.
login.explain_txt: Maintain correct posture with just your AirPods and NeckLife.
login.tos_msg: By logging in, you agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

tutorials.page1_txt: Maintain proper posture with just your AirPods
tutorials.page1_explain_txt2: The screen will change like this once connected
tutorials.page1_explain_txt3: Note: Only the specified models are supported
tutorials.page2_explain_txt1: Show us your correct posture that will be used as a reference
tutorials.page2_explain_txt2: Neck-Life detects posture changes based on the first correct posture you provided.
tutorials.page2_explain_txt4: Then press 'Measure Reference Posture' and maintain a correct posture for 5 seconds.
tutorials.page3_explain_txt1: Focus on your work while maintaining good posture
tutorials.page3_explain_txt2: Once the reference posture is measured, you will return to the main page and posture detection will start.
tutorials.page3_explain_txt3: Now, you can focus on your work!
tutorials.page3_explain_txt4: If your posture deteriorates unconsciously, you will be notified.

history.error_msg: No data found for this date.
history.graph_txt: Check the changes in your score

goal.time_setting: Measure for more than 2 hours a day
goal.score_setting: Get a posture score of 80 or higher today

history_view.average_posture_lose_time: Your posture deteriorates every {} on average

score_explain.how_to_score: How is the posture score calculated?
score_explain.how_to_score_explain: The posture score is calculated based on changes in your posture, comparing it to your reference posture. The fewer the changes, the higher your score.

alarm_setting_view.alarm_sensitive_explain: Higher sensitivity means more strict detection, but may trigger alerts for minor movements.
alarm_setting_view.alarm_time_explain: Set how long you can maintain bad posture before receiving an alert.
